name: @revibe-dev/revibe-blk-system-styles
description: An SCSS styling library used to change the styling of a website/component library.

scripts.css:compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/blk-design-system-pro-react.scss blk-design-system-pro-react.css
scripts.css: npm run css:lint && npm run css:compile && npm run css:prefix && npm run css:minify
scripts.yarn-css: yarn css:lint && yarn css:compile && yarn css:prefix && yarn css:minify

author: Revibe Developer Team
